channel.title: Helpp! codes
channel.description:
:mad: i do all the stuff that the tuts say and i change stuff in the client.java and i log into the sever and nothing changes i try entering the command like ::help or something nothing happens or nothing changed its really anouying and i really need someone that can help me......
:|

item.title: Helpp! codes
item.dc:creator: @cutter cutter
item.description:
@cutter wrote:

It might also be that you need to compile when you change something, not runserver.bat …

Read full topic

item.title: Helpp! codes
item.dc:creator: @cutter cutter
item.description:
@cutter wrote:

If the codes don’t exist yet then you need to add them:

Eg. Try going into client.java and searching for

if(command.startsWith("

or

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("

Then add the commands underneath that:
Eg. if(command.startsWith("whip")) { addItem(4151, 1); }

And then you need to compile it for the commands to actually be added.

Read full topic
